title: DSA Level 1 â€” Arrays & Complexity Basics
intro: This level reviews arrays and introduces the idea of time complexity.
points: Revisit 1D arrays and common operations: traversal, insertion (concept), deletion (concept).
Write simple functions to search and process arrays.
Understand the meaning of time complexity in a basic way.
Recognize O(1), O(n) using simple examples.
Start thinking about efficient versus inefficient solutions.
